name: SURREALITY - Expressions of the Unconscious
storyline:
Three levels of play!

There are three levels of action, presented in sequence, allowing a free choice of deepening for the adventurer, where the degree of immersion in the world of Surrealism will be decided in any way that suits him:

Real World - It is the first level, for those who do not dare to enter the mind. This world offers a wide range of material regarding Surrealism. Ideal for those who just want to do research.

Human Mind - Conscious: You have already entered the human mind, now your perception of the world around you is slightly changed, explore as you wish. There are several environments that keep countless surprises for the one who is brave. Ideal for those who want to delve deeper into the Surrealist universe, here you also have extensive research material, apart from some surprises that await you.

Human Mind - Unconscious: Finally you reach the heart of Surreality. The Unconscious reserves many surprises in addition to those that your eyes can reach. Make no mistake, explore as much as possible, talk to everyone and try different possibilities, you will not be punished for trying, most of the time you will have another chance. There are several secrets in countless environments. If you are able, you will achieve your ultimate goal, the Macrocosm!

Three Finals!

Play multiple times! In addition to not having a linear order to explore the universe of Surreality, you will have three totally different endings at your disposal. Your attitudes during the journey will influence your future decisions.

Innovative!

A totally original and unprecedented concept, it combines the excitement of adventure games with knowledge, culture and art. Explore a huge 3D world, find important elements and take them with you so you can use them later. Talk to beings of different personalities, each one behaves in a different way and has a different way of thinking, it is up to you to interact with them in any way you want.

Extra Attractions!

There are several attractions that will give Surreality a long life, here are some of them:

“Automatic Writing” machine - Try and have fun for hours in a game that allows you to create more than 1 million phrases! You will never see a phrase repeated. Get ready for the unusual, as you will really be amazed by this machine.

“Delicate Corpse” - It is another Surrealistic game, you will be asked for a word, between verb, subject and adjective. Write and watch the other participants in the game write without one knowing what the other wrote. Get ready for lots of laughter and amazement. This game is a real emulator of “Delicate Corpse”, each participant thinks like a real person and the game will reflect that. Must-see, play for hours.

"Razor" - Based on a Surrealistic concept, "A razor in the eye of society", play as much as you like this mini action game and try to end the eye of society. Extreme fun.

And it's not just these attractions. You will also find the film “Um Cão Andaluz”, a masterpiece by Luis Buñuel and Salvador Dali, in its full version, without cuts. In addition, answer a game of questions, try to open the psychic locks, listen to hidden music, see unpublished pictures, discover highly hidden secrets and many more attractions that will make you travel for hours on end regardless of fulfilling the goal of reaching the goal. Macrocosm.

Original Soundtrack!

There are over 40 minutes of top quality music created exclusively for the Universe of Surreality! Original and engaging, a lot of Rock, techno and New Age.

Hours of Dialogues!

Talk in a non-linear way with the beings that inhabit Surreality! Many of the conversations are optional, and increase interest in the subject at hand. In addition to tips for continuing the adventure, you can earn some valuable items essential to achieve the Macrocosm. In addition, you will also learn a lot about Surrealism and its Techniques.

Interactive Scenarios!

More than 1500 richly rendered and animated navigation screens in a 3D world. The first person view will put you inside the plot. Interact with the elements of the scenarios in a free way.

More than 15 totally different environments, each one with dozens of scenes.

Videos!

Increasing your interaction, more than 20 minutes of “full motion” video, including the full film by Luis Buñuel and Salvador Dali, “Um Cão Andaluz”.

Texts!

The entire text is exclusively available in the book, that is, you can consult it at any time after having it in your inventory. In the book, in addition to the history of Surrealism, you will learn about the Pre-Surrealists, you will see images and photographs, you will have the Surrealist manifesto, written by André Breton in full, in addition to a lot of useful information for those looking to know more about this movement.

Surreality! A unique experience!

An Adventure Without Limits!
summary:
Welcome to your mind!

In the 1920s, artists led by André Breton came together to create a new form of art, an art that used the expressions of the unconscious through Psychic Automatism. For that, they developed Surrealistic Techniques, which are nothing more than ways to bring out this dark side of the human mind.

Today, you must follow in their footsteps, bravely exploring and exploring a strange and bizarre world, bringing out the imagery and genius of the Surrealist movement.

Be taken on a journey through Surreal Techniques and, if you are the chosen one, you will reach your final goal: The Macrocosm! Witness an inner universe and actively participate in this unusual saga, which may lead you to follow other directions.

But don't think that this will be an easy task! You will experience immersion in a virtual environment where you must interact freely with the objects and beings that live there. Your mission in search of the Supra-Reality will be arduous, you will have to follow the path that the Artists and Philosophers of the Surrealist Universe have followed. Be careful, you can reach places that are not so welcoming.

It is up to you to discover the secrets of this exotic environment, for this you will have the help of strange beings who may be willing to help you. There will be times when your skills will be put into practice, reasoning, intelligence, inspiration, agility and a good sense of exploration are some of the ingredients that you must take to venture into Surreality.

Culture, Art, Entertainment and Knowledge come together to form an authentic Surrealist experience in an inhospitable and unknown world called Unconscious.
